feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Sat, 04 Nov 2023 08:03:32
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Microsoft is extending firmware updates for many Surface PCs to at least six years.
- IBM has introduced Watsonx Code Assistant, an AI-powered tool to revolutionize enterprise coding.
- GitInsights is a tool that provides a weekly summary email of a team's GitHub activity.

Business:
- Capital One has opened a new airport lounge in Denver, offering free access to some credit cardholders.
- Amazon delivery drivers can earn up to $40,000 per year, along with benefits.
- The BRICS countries have the potential to challenge the dominance of the US dollar in the global economy.

AI:
- IBM's Watsonx Code Assistant utilizes AI to assist with enterprise coding.
- The EU is attempting to gain new powers to intercept encrypted web traffic.

Other:
- Pomerantz Law Firm is investigating claims related to shareholder alerts.
- A former North Bergen official has changed their plea deal and may avoid prison time.
- Sika deer distribution and its impact on bioclimatic conditions are being studied.
- Mark Meadows' conservative book publisher is suing him for alleged lies in his memoir.
- Sam Bankman-Fried is facing potential prison time.
- Jeff Bezos is relocating to Miami, joining an exclusive neighborhood known as the "billionaire bunker."
- Swedish fintech company Klarna has reached an agreement with workers, avoiding a strike.
- Cup Noodles is switching to new microwave-safe packaging.
- Daylight saving time can disrupt sleep patterns.
- Huntley District 158 has appointed Dana Wiley to the board.
- Vivian Gamble's obituary has been published.
- The FDA has proposed banning brominated vegetable oil due to safety concerns.
- The best gaming chairs, iPhone 15 Pro deals, TVs, and Black Friday mattress deals are highlighted.
- US stocks have experienced a significant rally following a positive jobs report.
- The judge in Donald Trump's fraud trial has expanded the gag order due to threats.
